name: JMPR
description:
JMPR is a finely-crafted unforgiving single-player hardcore 2d platformer, or “Meatlike,” for the most diehard platforming fans. JMPR distills platforming down to its very bones, focusing solely on delivering polished and precise movement without distractions from story, dialog or cinematics.

Make every jump count!

  • 201 Handcrafted Levels
  • Collect all the lighters and beat the par times to become a true master
  • 4 Bonus Challenge Levels that break all the rules
  • Jetpack and grappling hook gameplay
  • Death by spikes
  • Death by saws
  • Death by infinite void
  • Death by laser vaporization
  • Death by toxic goo
  • Occasional victory!
  • Keyboard and Gamepad support
